TopicTitle: Hey guys! This is my first post ;D

Articles.Content:
Just wanted to say hi to you all. I've been playing this game for a few months now, but for whatever reason I'm just now getting around to signing up on these forum:rolleyes:

Only question I have so far is: how do I set up my avatar here? The settings doesn't seem to want to let me change it

I look forward to a lot of happy times with you all ;D

Welcome to the forum, Arron Rift. You need to post a few more times before you account status automatically changes, and then you'll have the ability to customize your profile. It's an anti-spambot measure.

Hi Arron, and welcome to the forums!

Hope you enjoy your stay.
